name: LibriFox
tagline: A fully functional port of LibriVox for Firefox OS
body:
### LibriFox

LibriFox is a fully functional port of LibriVox for Firefox OS. More information will be coming soon!

### Development Blogs
Please visit our Development Blogs for daily progress updates!

[fccardiff's development blog](http://finncakinjava.blogspot.com)

[ahirschberg's development blog](http://ahirschberg-programming.blogspot.com)

### GitHub Repo
If you'd like to contribute, please post comments, pull requests, and issues on our [GitHub Repo](https://github.com/fccardiff/LibriFox/)!

### Trello
Additionally, we use Trello to handle requested features, user stories, and development progress. If you'd prefer to contribute on Trello, [our board is available here](https://trello.com/b/XOMldjmv/librifox)!
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
